6.1.18  7:16 pm   How can I be sure that I'm real?

     if you are not real then what the hell is

6.1.18  5:18 pm   Do capital letters incite capitalism?

     no

6.1.18  4:50 pm   how do you think I should to start getting know about the meaning of this life?

      do some experiments and try to create life out of only non-living things. then i think you will start to realize the meaning

6.1.18  4:07 pm   I'm writing an essay. Thoughts on what my introduction should sound like?

     not if you don't tell me what it's about

6.1.18  2:15 pm   how do i know you're REALLY bill wurtz.

     who else would i be

6.1.18  2:06 pm   What do you think of the internet?

     it's off to a great start

6.1.18  1:51 pm   you ever just walk when you walk

     yes, or maybe more

6.1.18  1:30 pm   is the nba rigged

      the advertising is rigged. for example when larry johnson says "i love this type of basketball shoes that i wear, i wear them all the time and i would still wear them even if they didn't pay me huge checks" that is rigged

6.1.18  1:18 pm   give your bank account information so I can donate you money

     you can do it here

6.1.18  1:05 pm   What happened to your reality page? It's been dead for two years.

     i spent 3 months making the entire thing, whilst every other page and channel went 'dead.' i tried to continue making 1 per day during august 2017, but that delayed the song/video too much. so it has not been dead for 2 years, it's actually only existed in the first place for 2 years

6.1.18  12:55 pm   Are you made of clocks?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it, yes

6.1.18  12:52 pm   Spiders are cute

     that may be true

6.1.18  12:41 pm   What's the meaning of love?

      the answer may surprise you

6.1.18  12:39 pm   How do you cry in Spanish?

     maybe about like this

6.1.18  12:35 pm   how do i code a person to make me music

     i say cut out the middle man, and just make the music

6.1.18  12:31 pm   What's your ratio of the number of things you've done, to the number of things you want to do?

     maybe like 1 to a billion but that's ok

6.1.18  12:21 pm   i feel like everyone else is better than me and nothing i do matters. what do you think?

     i am not following your logic

6.1.18  10:30 am   freedom is one hell of a drug, do you agree?

      it's pretty good

6.1.18  9:49 am   Are you woke?

      yes, and boke

6.1.18  9:29 am   will your live show have video (as well as music obviously)?

     nothing pre-recorded, and no screens

     more? what about, reading original writing? talking about yourself? live anagrams? something else entirely? 

     possibly

6.1.18  8:40 am   what's the best state

      good

6.1.18  8:35 am   being a person is hard

     that's true

6.1.18  8:01 am   What's your opinion on tritones?

     twangy

6.1.18  5:54 am   whats the difference between how do grown ups with grown ups and childs with childs talk together?

      grown ups talk a little more like robots

6.1.18  4:40 am   who is your favorite person

     you

6.1.18  2:34 am   What is something cool you notice but most people seem to overlook?

      continental drift

6.1.18  1:00 am   do you do anything other than create videos?

     i also make music, to go with the videos. or sometimes for a twist i make the music first and then make a video to go with it

6.1.18  12:44 am   You haven't posted a new song in a while (awhile? a while? What even is a "while"?)

     it's actually been less time than the amount of time it took to produce my previous song/video. and that amount of time was even still less than the amount of time it took to produce the song/video before that

6.1.18  12:38 am   What is one thing I should try when I go to college? 

     starting your own college

6.1.18  12:29 am   I mean it's just Wooooaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

isn't it?

     yes





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

5.31.18  11:37 pm   As I looked through the questions and their time stamps, I wondered do you ever get any time to sleep?

     that has nothing to do with the time stamps. the question is do the people who ask them get any time to sleep

5.31.18  11:22 pm   What is something you thing about on a day to day basis?

     how to do everything i do much faster without making it worse

5.31.18  10:53 pm   what's the meaning of normal

     losing your entire mind and going absolutely crazy

5.31.18  10:07 pm   i have a new roommate moving in. how do i establish myself as the alpha?

     you could try lifting weights so that way you might have bigger muscles

5.31.18  9:34 pm   What do you do besides work on content?  Genuine question.  Thanks

     fantasize about faster and better ways to make much much more content at a much faster pace

5.31.18  8:46 pm   for possible live shows, would you attempt a one-man operation with a loop pedal or pre-recorded tracks or the like?

     oh hell no

      Or perhaps recruit people to impersonate the bill wurtz band?

     if they are hired for the bill wurtz band they will not need to impersonate the bill wurtz band because they will already be it

5.31.18  8:23 pm   is it tomato or tomato?

     some tomatoes are tomatoes, whilst other tomatoes are tomatoes

     i'm guessing everyone is
